title: The fashion exec's guide to circularity - Vogue Business
summary: Circular fashion is gaining traction as a necessary concept for the industry to avoid excessive waste, but the industry is too focused on technological solutions from startups in the Global North and is neglecting its social impact, particularly in the Global South.

title: The Bay and ReturnBear Partner to Make Returns Easier Fran√ßais - Canada NewsWire
summary: Hudson's Bay has partnered with ReturnBear to provide easier returns for customers, including those who purchase from Marketplace sellers. Customers can now return items in-store or by mail using a QR code, and ReturnBear will handle the return process and provide tracking updates. This partnership is expected to enhance customer satisfaction and provide a more seamless return experience.

title: Recent Developments in Home Textiles - Fibre2fashion.com
summary: The global home textiles market is growing, with a CAGR of 3.8% between 2016 and 2021. The market is expected to reach $152 billion in 2025. China and the US are the biggest consumers, constituting around 60% of the global home textile imports.

title: How Influencer Marketing will Change the Business Landscape in 2023 - Indian Retailer
summary: AI is transforming the food and agriculture industry by enhancing productivity, sustainability, and innovation. It is optimizing farming practices, improving yield predictions, revolutionizing food production, and expanding the boundaries of culinary creativity. AI is also enhancing food safety and traceability, and driving the development of novel ingredients and flavors.
